front.title: Indicating Support for Interactive Connectivity Establishment (ICE) in the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: This specification defines a media feature tag and an option tag for use with the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP). The media feature tag allows a User Agent (UA) to communicate to its registrar that it supports ICE. The option tag allows a UA to require support for ICE in order for a call to proceed. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
